amendment.description: To modify a section relating to independent peer review of water resources projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4681 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 46. Record Vote Number: 208.

action.text: Amendment SA 4681 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S7814-7824, S7839) To modify a section relating to independent peer review of water resources projects.
